name: browser-wallet-x402-example
description: Example of x402 payments with browser wallet integration

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run build:x402 && cd server && npm install && cd ../merchant-frontend && npm install && cd ../analysis-engine && npm install && cd ../facilitator && npm install
scripts.build:x402: cd x402-packages && pnpm install && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 pnpm --filter x402 build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 pnpm --filter x402-hono build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 pnpm --filter x402-axios build
scripts.vercel:install: npm install && npm run build:x402 && npm run install:frontend
